task.title: Adding Water to an Overheated Radiator
task.shortdesc: Safely add water to an overheated radiator based on its current condition.

taskbody.prereq: Determine if the water system is completely empty or partially filled.
taskbody.context: Adding cold water to an overheated radiator requires different procedures depending on the current water level.

step.cmd: Check the current water level in the system
If the system is partially filled:
step.info: You may add cold water directly to the radiator

step.cmd: If the system is completely empty:

substep.cmd: Allow the motor to cool completely
Add cold water to the radiator
